scripts.postinstall: yarn run prepatch && yarn run patch && yarn run postinstall-mirador
scripts.postinstall-mirador: cd node_modules/mirador && yarn install && yarn run build
scripts.validate-iiif: find docs -name manifest.json -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 yarn run jsonlint
scripts.validate-json: find docs -name '*.gjson' -o -name '*.geojson' -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 yarn run jsonlint
scripts.validate: yarn run validate-iiif && yarn run validate-json
